1.title: Getting Ready for School
1.plot: Join Maurice and his friend Ruby as they 'Get Ready for School' for the very first time.

2.title: First Day at School
2.plot: Have your school bag ready and join Maurice and his friend Karim as they make new friends on their 'First Day of School'.

3.title: Lunchtime Play
3.plot: Pack your lunchbox and join Maurice and his friend Nina as they eat and play during their very 'First Lunchtime'.

4.title: Show and Tell
4.plot: Join Maurice and his friend Ethan as they teach their class how to make paper airplanes in their very first 'Show and Tell'.

5.title: School Trip
5.plot: Join Maurice and his friend Emma as they visit a nearby petting zoo on their very first 'School Trip'.

6.title: Music Class
6.plot: Have your singing voices ready and join Maurice and his friend Lucy as they learn all about percussion instruments in their 'First Music Class'.

7.title: School Sports Class
7.plot: Put on your running shoes and join Maurice and his friend Scout as they get stuck in the mud in 'School Sports Class'.

8.title: Birthday Party
8.plot: Maurice has been invited to his classmate Matteo's birthday party. Maurice's friend Carolena is helping Maurice get ready for the party. It's a dress-up party so everyone gets to dress up.

9.title: New Baby Sibling
9.plot: It's a special day for Maurice. His friend Lucas has asked if Maurice can stay to meet his new baby brother for the very first time.

10.title: Trip to the Beach
10.plot: Maurice is going to the beach for the first time, and his friend Luke is joining him. Maurice is really excited to go to the beach.

11.title: First Camping Trip
11.plot: Maurice and his friend Addison are going camping in the backyard. First they'll need to put up the tent, with some help from Addison's Mum. Then they'll need to check they have all the supplies they need for the camping trip.

12.title: Getting a Pet
12.plot: Oh boy. Today's the day Maurice and his friend Marc get their first pet - a puppy. She's a girl puppy and she's very excited to meet Maurice too. What will they name her?

imdb.plot outline: Maurice's Big Adventure is a journey of friendship and wonder. Presented by Playschool favourites, Justine Clarke and Miranda Tapsell, the series acts as a playful and optimistic guide for Preschoolers. The show encourages children to be brave when face those important first steps into the world. In every episode, Playschool's much-loved teddy bear, Maurice meets new friends and experiences an exciting new first. He gets ready for his first day of school, attends his first birthday party and helps a puppy dog settle into its new home. Each episode culminates in a beautiful song and montage featuring highlights from Maurice's adventure.

Each episode culminates in a beautiful song and montage featuring highlights from Maurice's adventure.
